original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tahaṁ tahaṁ olokentā piṇḍapātaṁ paṭiggaṇhanti, ākirantepi atikkantepi na jānanti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū tahaṃ tahaṃ olokentā piṇḍapātam paṭiggaṇhanti ākirante api atikkante api na jānanti pe
patta saññī piṇḍapātam paṭiggahessāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca tahaṁ tahaṁ olokento piṇḍapātaṁ paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokentaḥ piṇḍapātam paṭiggaṇhāti āpatti dukkaṭassa
